snippet: A fire that gutted a commuter bus, killing 47 and injuring dozens in southeastern China, appears to have been deliberately set, state media quoted investigators as saying.
abstract: Fire engulfs commuter bus in China, killing 47 people and injuring dozens of others; investigators believe fire was intentionally set.
lead_paragraph: A fire that gutted a commuter bus, killing 47 and injuring dozens in southeastern China, appears to have been deliberately set, state media quoted investigators as saying.

headline.main: China: At Least 47 Die in Bus Fire
headline.print_headline: China: At Least 47 Die in Bus Fire
